summary: Converts single band raster data cube to vector data
description: Converts a single band raster data cube into a vector data cube. The bounding polygon of uniform areas of pixels is constructed.

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description:
Coordinate reference system to reproject the converted vector to. Specified as an [EPSG code](http://www.epsg-registry.org/) or [WKT2 CRS string](http://docs.opengeospatial.org/is/18-010r7/18-010r7.html).
When no projection (or null) is given, the reference system of the input raster data cube is used.
